text: Robert Swire-Thompson (born 5 November 1982), also known as Anscenic, is an Australian DJ, musician, record producer, singer and songwriter. Since 1998, he has been a member of the drum and bass band Pendulum, alongside Gareth McGrillen. In 2011, Swire and McGrillen left the band and created an electro house duo called Knife Party. title: Rob Swire
